name: Google Sheets Node
description: Reads or writes data from/to a Google Sheet using stored Google OAuth credentials.

inputs.name: spreadsheet_id
inputs.label: Spreadsheet ID
inputs.description: The unique ID of the Google Sheets document.

inputs.name: range
inputs.label: Range
inputs.description: The range in A1 notation, e.g., 'Sheet1!A1:C10'.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.description: Choose whether to read or write data.

inputs.name: values
inputs.label: Values (for write)
inputs.description: List of lists representing the rows and columns to write, only required when action=write.

outputs.name: result
outputs.label: Sheet Data or Write Response
outputs.description: For 'read' — returns sheet values; for 'write' — returns the API update response.
